long_description: Find the rhythm of the water in the fully outfitted, seaworthy Eddyline Samba Kayak with Skeg. With its high-quality ABS hull, you'll find it easy to maneuver and fun to paddle on any adventure. Co-extruded ABS laminate creates a hull that offers the looks and performance of a composite kayak with the durability of plastic; exterior is abrasion- and UV-resistant. Hard chines and a 22.5 in. width provide medium initial stability and medium- to high secondary stability; it's made to move smoothly and efficiently through the water. Adjustable seat and backband provide support and comfort; contoured thighbraces ensure a comfortable paddling position. Drop-down skeg allows for straight tracking; adjust its position to allow for crosswinds, current, or wave direction. Bulkheads and hatches, perimeter lines, deck bungees and retractable carry handles complete the package. The Eddyline Samba kayak weighs 43 lbs.
short_description: Find the rhythm of the water in the fully outfitted, seaworthy Eddyline Samba Kayak with Skeg. With its high-quality ABS hull, you'll find it easy to maneuver and fun to paddle on any adventure.
